#summary Read SIFT Results

this node parses SIFT[http://sift.jcvi.org/www/SIFT_chr_coords_submit.html] results

= Parameters =


  * *CHROM* : VCF CHROM
  * *POS* : VCF POS
  * *REF* : VCF REF
  * *ALT* : VCF ALT
  * *SIFT* : Sift column containing the mutation

= Input =


  * *in1* : VCF

  * *int2* : SIFT result


= Output =


  * *out1* : VCF
